user_question: How can nanotechnology be used to improve solar panel efficiency, and generate an image of a futuristic solar panel design?
final_answer: Nanotechnology can improve solar panel efficiency by using nanostructured materials to enhance light absorption and reduce energy loss. Nanostructured materials enhance light absorption by creating a larger surface area for light interaction and by trapping light within the material, leading to increased energy conversion efficiency. Image of a futuristic solar panel design generated.
